posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Oh, it's easy as pie, guys!
Just don't expect to create anything as elaborate as Grom's...

Let me guide you step-by-step:

1. You go there ->  Signature Maker
2. Select a Background style
2a. Select a Pattern style
2b. Write some text in the Text Box, change fonts if you like, alter the size, etc.
3. Select -> Download the Image
4. Go to your Profile -> Signature -> Upload the Banner
Done.
